title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\EventInput
name: EventInput
description:
Events allow for matching intents by event name instead of the natural language input. For instance, input <event: { name: "welcome_event", parameters: { name: "Sam" } }> can trigger a personalized welcome response.

The parameter name may be used by the agent in the response: "Hello #welcome_event.name! What can I do for you today?".

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.EventInput

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Required. The language of this query. See Language Support for a list of the currently supported language codes. Note that queries in the same session do not necessarily need to specify the same language.
